org.hps.recon.ecal.cluster

Class ClusterEnergyCorrection2019

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.recon.ecal.cluster.ClusterEnergyCorrection2019

  • public final class ClusterEnergyCorrection2019
extends Object
    This class handles the cluster energy correction for the 2019 run, to include edge corrections and sampling fractions derived from data.

      • computeCorrectedEnergy

        public static double computeCorrectedEnergy(HPSEcal3 ecal,
                                            int pdg,
                                            double rawEnergy,
                                            double xpos,
                                            double ypos,
                                            boolean isMC)
        Calculates energy correction based on cluster raw energy and particle type as per HPS Note 2014-001
        Parameters:
        ecal -
        pdg - Particle id as per PDG
        rawEnergy - Raw Energy of the cluster (sum of hits with shared hit distribution)
        xpos -
        ypos -
        isMC -
        Returns:
        Corrected Energy

      • computeCorrectedEnergy

        private static double computeCorrectedEnergy(double y,
                                             double rawEnergy,
                                             org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.polynomials.PolynomialSplineFunction splineA,
                                             org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.polynomials.PolynomialSplineFunction splineB,
                                             org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.polynomials.PolynomialSplineFunction splineC,
                                             boolean isMC)
        Calculates the energy correction to a cluster given the variables from the fit as per HPS Note 2014-001 Note that this is correct as there is a typo in the formula print in the note.
        Parameters:
        rawEnergy - Raw energy of the cluster
        A,B,C - from fitting in note
        Returns:
        Corrected Energy
